keyword.name: left
keyword.title: Clockwise left face turn
keyword.doc: Calls the function which turns the left face clockwise.

keyword.name: antileft
keyword.title: Anti-clockwise left face turn
keyword.doc: Calls the function which turns the left face anti-clockwise.

keyword.name: right
keyword.title: Clockwise right face turn
keyword.doc: Calls the function which turns the right face clockwise.

keyword.name: antiright
keyword.title: Anti-clockwise right face turn
keyword.doc: Calls the function which turns the right face anti-clockwise.

keyword.name: down
keyword.title: Clockwise down face turn
keyword.doc: Calls the function which turns the down face clockwise.

keyword.name: antidown
keyword.title: Anti-clockwise down face turn
keyword.doc: Calls the function which turns the down face anti-clockwise.

keyword.name: up
keyword.title: Clockwise upper face turn
keyword.doc: Calls the function which turns the upper face clockwise.

keyword.name: antiup
keyword.title: Anti-clockwise upper face turn
keyword.doc: Calls the function which turns the upper face anti-clockwise.

keyword.name: back
keyword.title: Clockwise back face turn
keyword.doc: Calls the function which turns the back face clockwise.

keyword.name: antiback
keyword.title: Anti-clockwise back face turn
keyword.doc: Calls the function which turns the back face anti-clockwise.

keyword.name: front
keyword.title: Clockwise front face turn
keyword.doc: Calls the function which turns the front face clockwise.

keyword.name: antifront
keyword.title: Anti-clockwise front face turn
keyword.doc: Calls the function which turns the front face anti-clockwise.

keyword.name: randomturn
keyword.title: Random turn
keyword.doc: Turns a random face of the cube.

keyword.name: movedown
keyword.title: Downward move of the cube
keyword.doc: Turn the view of the cube to display its upper face.

keyword.name: moveup
keyword.title: Upward move of the cube
keyword.doc: Turn the view of the cube to display its down face.

keyword.name: moveleft
keyword.title: Leftward move of the cube
keyword.doc: Turn the view of the cube to display its right face.

keyword.name: moveright
keyword.title: Rightward move of the cube
keyword.doc: Turn the view of the cube to display its left face.

keyword.name: rotate
keyword.title: Clockwise rotation of the cube
keyword.doc: Rotate the view of the cube clockwise.

keyword.name: antirotate
keyword.title: Anti-clockwise rotation of the cube
keyword.doc: Rotate the view of the cube anti-clockwise.
